statements: SELECT id, item_name, category, quantity FROM painting_supplies;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity, id FROM painting_supplies;
SELECT category, quantity, item_name, id FROM painting_supplies;
SELECT id, item_name FROM painting_supplies;
SELECT category, quantity FROM painting_supplies;
SELECT * FROM painting_supplies WHERE category = 'Brushes' ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM painting_supplies WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM painting_supplies WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY category ASC, item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM painting_supplies WHERE category = 'Paint' AND quantity >= 15 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM painting_supplies WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY category DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM brushes WHERE material = 'Acrylic'
SELECT id, brand, color FROM paints ORDER BY brand DESC
SELECT color, quantity FROM paints WHERE brand = 'Winsor & Newton'
SELECT * FROM brushes WHERE size IN ('Small', 'Medium')
SELECT id, material FROM brushes
SELECT * FROM brushes WHERE material = 'Acrylic' AND size = 'Small'
SELECT brand, color FROM paints WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY color DESC
SELECT id, brand, quantity FROM paints WHERE brand LIKE 'B%' OR color LIKE 'B%'
SELECT * FROM brushes JOIN paints ON brushes.material = paints.color
SELECT id, brand, color, quantity FROM paints WHERE brand = 'Brand A'
SELECT * FROM brushes WHERE brand='Winsor & Newton';
SELECT brush_id, type, material FROM brushes ORDER BY brush_id DESC;
SELECT brand, COUNT(*) FROM brushes GROUP BY brand;
SELECT * FROM canvases WHERE size='12x16' AND material='cotton';
SELECT brand, color FROM paints WHERE volume_mL >= 100;
SELECT * FROM brushes WHERE type = 'Round' ORDER BY brand DESC
SELECT brand, type FROM brushes WHERE material = 'Synthetic' ORDER BY type
SELECT * FROM canvases WHERE material = 'Linen' AND stretched = TRUE
SELECT * FROM paints WHERE volume_mL >= 1000 ORDER BY color
SELECT brand, color FROM paints WHERE brand = 'Winsor & Newton'
SELECT * FROM brushes ORDER BY brand DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM canvases WHERE material='Canvas' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT type, price FROM brushes WHERE price > 50;
SELECT color, price FROM paints WHERE brand='Liquitex' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM brushes ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT brand, type FROM paints WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM canvases WHERE material = 'canvas';
SELECT brand, price FROM paints WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_type = 'canvas';
SELECT * FROM brushes;
SELECT brand, type FROM brushes ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT id, size FROM canvases WHERE material='Canvas';
SELECT * FROM paints WHERE volume > 3.0 ORDER BY color;
SELECT brand, size, price FROM canvases JOIN inventory ON item_id = id WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT brand, type, size FROM brushes WHERE size='Small';
SELECT id, material, size, price FROM canvases ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT brand, color, volume FROM paints WHERE volume > 3 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';

SELECT b.brand, c.material, p.color, s.name, i.quantity FROM brushes b, canvases c, paints p, suppliers s, inventory i WHERE b.id = i.item_id AND i.supplier_id = s.id AND c.id = i.item_id AND p.id = i.item_id ORDER BY p.color ASC;
